WRITING.TEXT: The film was very good, but actually seeing the possible sword of William Wallace was brilliant. Makes you think about history and the lives lost.

WRITING.TITLE: Photoshop tutorial - Statue of Liberty manipulation
Photoshop tutorial - Statue of Liberty manipulation

WRITING.TEXT: I think I saw you waving when I was there.. the sky was quite clear lol :)
I have some brilliant photos from the top of the monument...
It is class, 4 floors of history :) and the view from the very top, it was amazing although it did make my legs a bit shaky on it!! Lol
Yea we did it right! Was brilliant!
